quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: We love the things we love for what they are.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In love, no one can harm anyone else; we are each of us responsible for our own feelings and cannot blame someone else for what we feel.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: We are shaped and fashioned by what we love.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round, love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Browning

quotes.quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible—it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
quotes.author: Barbara de Angelis

quotes.quote: Love is simply the name for the desire and the pursuit of the whole.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Love is that which, cannot see the poorness..
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is not blind—it simply enables one to see things others fail to see.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is patient, love is kind...
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 13:4-8

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Moulin Rouge

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas sparks

quotes.quote: Spending time with you showed me what true love really means.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love understands love; it needs no talk.
quotes.author: Francis Havergal
